duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide support and coordination for virtual and in-person events, ensuring participant engagement and satisfaction.
Assist faculty and facilitators with logistics and technology use at events and on the online learning platform.
Manage invoicing, payments, and logistics for in-person events and conferences.
Identify and develop solutions to enhance participant experience and streamline event processes.
Participate in team meetings and cross-training sessions to ensure consistent approach in the coordinator's absence.
Model a customer-focused approach, providing support to both internal and external clients.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Event Management, Hospitality, or related field (Master's preferred)
